about_the_game:
Plot

In this epic fanfiction visual novel you can play as some of your favorite youtubers as they try to navigate through school in this fictional world. A new student has just arrived at Otaku Academy and is about to make friends for life and maybe some enemy's as well. A sudden disagreement over an anime has started a civil war between two anime clubs at school. However there is not a big enough for the both of them. Who's will be the better club? Find out by playing this cringe but fun visual novel.

Setting

Takes place in a alternative universe home to Otaku Academy where students learn like a normal school but all of the characters are tropes of all bad anime fanfiction.

Key Features

    [* Meet 10 Characters.* Make choices that will change the story.*several hours of dialog.]

legal_notice: I don't own anything this is a fan made game using visual novel maker. These characters are based off real content creators so don't be weird chat and just play the game and have fun.
name: My Otaku Academia

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo
  • Memory: 4 GB MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 / OpenGL capable GPU
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 Display
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: A Fan made game of 9 Anitube all stars and a mystery girl. Play as Nux Taku as his first day in a new school begins! Make friends, enemies, and fall in love!
